content:
\bibitem{werner2022sok}
Sam Werner, Daniel Perez, Lewis Gudgeon, Ariah Klages-Mundt, Dominik Harz, and
  William Knottenbelt.
\newblock Sok: Decentralized finance (defi).
\newblock In {\em Proceedings of the 4th ACM Conference on Advances in
  Financial Technologies}, pages 30--46, 2022.

\bibitem{wood2018we}
Gavin Wood.
\newblock Why we need web 3.0.
\newblock {\em Medium: https://gavofyork. medium.
  com/why-we-need-web-3-0-5da4f2bf95ab adresinden al{\i}nm{\i}{\c{s}}t{\i}r},
  2018.

\bibitem{wu2023towards}
Jiajing Wu, Dan Lin, Qishuang Fu, Shuo Yang, Ting Chen, Zibin Zheng, and Bowen
  Song.

  the lenses of ethereum heists.
\newblock {\em IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security}, 2023.

\bibitem{wu2023financial}
Jiajing Wu, Kaixin Lin, Dan Lin, Ziye Zheng, Huawei Huang, and Zibin Zheng.

\bibitem{xia2021trade}

\bibitem{xiang2023babd}

\newblock {\em IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security}, 2023.

\bibitem{xie2019libra}

Jia Xu, Zhengqiang Rao, Lijie Xu, Dejun Yang, and Tao Li.

\bibitem{xu2023sok}
Jiahua Xu, Krzysztof Paruch, Simon Cousaert, and Yebo Feng.

\bibitem{yang2023anti}
Guangyi Yang, Xiaoxing Liu, and Beixin Li.

\bibitem{yang2024uncover}
Shuo Yang, Jiachi Chen, Mingyuan Huang, Zibin Zheng, and Yuan Huang.

\bibitem{ye2020clairvoyance}
Jiaming Ye, Mingliang Ma, Yun Lin, Yulei Sui, and Yinxing Xue.

\bibitem{yu2023money}
Lei Yu, Fengjun Zhang, Jiajia Ma, Li~Yang, Yuanzhe Yang, and Wei Jia.

\bibitem{zhang2019lay}

\bibitem{zhou2023visual}
